name: Victor Vran: Overkill Edition
summary: Overkill Edition includes the fully updated and award winning Action RPG Victor Vran, the expansive Fractured Worlds & the legendary Motörhead: Through The Ages. Look your very best and reinforce your play style with a monumental arsenal of powerful weapons, game-changing outfits, wicked demon powers and fate-binding destiny cards. Redefine how you play at any moment, even in the heat of battle. Modify your demon slaying loadout as you dodge deadly attacks, leap from towering locations and take on hordes of hideous beasts and cunning boss monsters. Fedora or no fedora, you decide! Slaying demons doesn't have to be a lonely affair - Form a pack and find even greater strength in numbers, to explore the story of the dark world together.

esrb.synopsis: This is an action role-playing game in which players assume the role of Victor Vran, a demon hunter on a quest to stop a demon invasion. From a 3/4-overhead perspective, players traverse towns/dungeons and engage in frenetic melee-style against demonic creatures (e.g., hellhounds, skeletons, succubi). Players use swords, firearms, and magic attacks to kill enemy creatures. Blood-splatter effects occur frequently as monsters are killed; large blood stains can be seen on the floors of a torture chamber and dripping from bloody altars/fountains. During the course of the game, one female creature is depicted nude—though without any discernible details (i.e., no nipples or genitalia). Some song lyrics contain the word “f**k”; “sh*t” can also be heard in the dialogue.
